Oh, oops.  I posted where G1 TF were.  My mistake, Africa possibly, and it 
may have been Pangea, though I don't it (I'd have to research it).  But...the 
desert, jungle, and places like the Darkside was (maybe not anymore) all 
exist(ed) in Africa.  But for sure, by Season 3, the Maxis were stationed in 
Oregon (If you go by the comic).  Like I said though, it took place all over 
the world.  I mean heck, they were walking around in bloody England in the 
first episode.
